rows.label: qev200602_MSG0001
rows.name:
I have been waiting for you. I believe this is our first
time meeting, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0011
rows.name: Confirm that you have never met before.

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0021
rows.name: Claim that you have met once before.

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0030
rows.name: Strongly Disagree

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that this is actually the THIRD time you have met.

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0002
rows.name: Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0003
rows.name: You are very kind. Or perhaps just gullible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0004
rows.name: ...It's me! Yardley! Remember good ol' Yardley?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0005
rows.name: Huh? That's not what I expected you to say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0006
rows.name:
I thought you'd say this was our third meeting.
Maybe you lost your memory or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0007
rows.name: ...It's me! Yardley! ...This is our third encounter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0008
rows.name: Heh. Aren't you the smart one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0009
rows.name: Well, I guess you know it's good ol' Yardley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0010
rows.name:
So I know you may have some doubts, but I promise it
was always me you've been meeting with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0011
rows.name: I just...changed my appearance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0012
rows.name: So you know that keycard you found for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0013
rows.name:
Well, it activates the Lifepod I worked so desperately
to repair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0014
rows.name:
You see, we humans are basically just souls housed in
mimeosomes, which are little more than temporary
vessels.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0015
rows.name:
But with this situation comes a kind of freedom:
The freedom to change vessels at will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0016
rows.name:
The Mimeosome Maintenance Center is full of Lifepods,
but they're all reserved for clinical applications.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0017
rows.name: Us normal yokels aren't allowed near 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0018
rows.name:
Which means that this is the only Lifepod where
people can rebuild their bodies to suit their whims.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0019
rows.name:
I expect you have your doubts about the process,
but I stand as proof of the results.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0020
rows.name:
My consciousness has been successfully transplanted
into an entirely new body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0040
rows.name: Request

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask to use Yardley's Lifepod.

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0050
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0051
rows.name:
Express concern that a criminal
might misuse such technology.

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0060
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0061
rows.name: Compliment Yardley on his scheme.

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0021
rows.name: Pshaw! Of course! Anyone can use it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0022
rows.name: They just have to pay a totally reasonable service fee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0023
rows.name: Only 1,000,000 credits! ...Per use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh, I wouldn't worry about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0025
rows.name:
With my prices, it's safely out of the reach of petty
criminals and other riffraff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0026
rows.name:
Even a kingpin would think twice before rushing into
things. I charge a million credits a pop, after all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0027
rows.name:
I was lucky to stumble onto a Lifepod with only minor
damage at the south end of the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0028
rows.name:
And crossing your path was another stroke of luck,
seeing as how you've helped me out twice now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0029
rows.name:
And at the end of that string of serendipity is my
golden opportunity to strike it rich.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0030
rows.name:
New LA's wealthiest will be clamoring to use my
machine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0031
rows.name:
Oh, but you're welcome to use it for free whenever
you want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0032
rows.name:
Let's just say it's a way to settle up my outstanding
debts. So whaddya say? Interested?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0070
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0071
rows.name: Assure Yardley that you'll put it to good use.

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0080
rows.name: Demand

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Yardley that you want to be paid in cash instead.

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0033
rows.name: Wonderful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0034
rows.name: Then from this point on, we're square.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0035
rows.name: Um, were you not listening to what I said?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0036
rows.name:
I am ABOUT to become massively wealthy.
At the moment, however, I am flat busted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0037
rows.name:
So do us both a favor and forget about money for a
moment. Seize this unique opportunity to discover a
new you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0038
rows.name:
Besides, others have to pay a million bones a pop,
while you get unlimited access in perpetuity for free!
It's a far greater value than some paltry cash payment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0039
rows.name:
Now just accept the offer and enjoy the Lifepod
already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0040
rows.name: ...Phew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0041
rows.name: I have only two stipulations for our agreement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0042
rows.name: One is that you don't tell anybody about this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0043
rows.name:
I doubt the director general would be pleased to hear
about my little business model.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0044
rows.name:
And two is that you only use the machine late at night,
while I'm around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0045
rows.name:
That should be a given, seeing as it won't activate
without my keycard, but just in case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0046
rows.name: Are we agreed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0090
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0091
rows.name: Promise to abide by Yardley's rules.

rows.label: qev200602_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev200602_SEL0101
rows.name: Say that you refuse to make any promises.

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0047
rows.name: Deal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0048
rows.name: I hope this leads to good things for the both of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0049
rows.name:
Well, that's enough yakking, I think. If you want to
take the Lifepod for a spin, step right up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0050
rows.name: Er, yeah. No. That's not... That doesn't work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0051
rows.name:
Okay, I admit that I cheated you out of a reward
before, but I'm being totally upfront and fair with you
right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0052
rows.name:
Look, why not try the Lifepod for yourself right now?
One taste and you'll never go back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200602_MSG0053
rows.name: Now come on! Step up and embrace a new you![ST:wait ]
